channel.title: Sig request
channel.description:
Alright, i'm requesting a sig. the requirements are as follows:
[ul][li]It must be calm[/li] [li]The color must be like in this pic, perhaps slightly darker: [img]http://i16.photobucket.com/albums/b19/fronick/CynicES.jpg[/img][/li] [li]It should have the CYNIC logo in there, but it should be too big [img]http://www.cynicalsphere.com/logo_cynicmain.jpg[/img][/li] [li]below the cynic logo, it should say something like evolutionary sleeper(indented compared to the logo), with a font that's like the one used in the logo[/li] [li]if it fits, a nice picture of paul masvidal would be great, pick either of them: [list] [li][url=http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/3908/cynicreunion003cd0.jpg]http://img230.imageshack.us/img230/3908/cynicreunion003cd0.jpg[/url][/li] [li][url=http://img455.imageshack.us/img455/4660/cynicreunion006ai4.jpg]http://img455.imageshack.us/img455/4660/cynicreunion006ai4.jpg[/url][/li] [/list][/li][/ul]

item.title: Sig request
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

hmm, i’m not sure what it’d look like, could you post it?
a border would be nice i guess, but not too big(1px is big enough i guess)

eh… I will redo fonts if you do not like them. Also would you want a border or anything? And I will redo color now -.-

do you want the guy in blue or the way he is now?

item.title: Sig request

item.description:
@sppt wrote:

Alright, i’m requesting a sig.
the requirements are as follows:

[ul][li]It must be calm[/li]
[li]The color must be like in this pic, perhaps slightly darker:
[/li]
[li]It should have the CYNIC logo in there, but it should be too big
[/li]
[li]below the cynic logo, it should say something like evolutionary sleeper(indented compared to the logo), with a font that’s like the one used in the logo[/li]
